  • Constructor Details

    • Snake

      public Snake(float x, float y, float speed, float cellsize)
      metod responsible for creating the snake
      Parameters:
      x - initial x coordinate
      y - initial y coordinate
      speed - initial speed
      cellsize - body segment size, which should be the same as the cell size

  • Method Details

    • handleInput

      public void handleInput()
      method responsible for handling input, checking if the new direction is feasible and changing the head pointing direction accordingly

    • update

      public void update()
      method responsible for updating the snake state, will move every body segment and update its pointing direction accordingly

    • render

      public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer renderer)
      method responsible for rendering the snake at the screen, will address each body segment separatedly
      Parameters:
      renderer - rendering unit responsible for output the snake drawing

    • getBodySegments

      public List<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> getBodySegments()
      Returns:
      the list containing the snakes body segments

    • grow

      public void grow()
      method responsible for adding new body segments to the snake, asserting they are at the end of the body and point to the right direction

    • increaseSpeed

      public void increaseSpeed(float increment)
      method responsible for changing the snake speed
      Parameters:
      increment - amount per wich the speed will change
